works.title: Web Developer
description: Worked with a team of developers to developed  a web application that helped the company to transition to paperless for purchase requests and purchase request approval process.
Write clean, optimised and manageable code for our internal projects.
Communicate and collaborate with a team of developers, designers and project managers on a daily basis.

works.title: Front-end Developer
description: Worked with a team of developers to rebuild the current e-commerce website that made it more elegant and performant.
Tested sites in various browsers and devices to ensure cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
Communicate and collaborate with a team of developers, designers and project managers on a daily basis.

works.title: Junior Software Engineer (Intern)
description: Worked as a junior software engineer and helped senior developer in developing various web application.
